info.name: Hacker News Minimal Theme
info.additionalInfo:
Changelog
========

07-01-2017
* meet WCAG 2 AA color contrast ratio thresholds

03-23-2016

* animation effect on link hover
* fix comment color

03-22-2015

* style <input> and <select> elements
* style passwords
* style search box

03-21-2015

* remove footer border
* switch to Open Sans font
* update <code> blocks font
* update textarea styles for Firefox
* emphasize "More" link with »
* soften link colors
* update login/register page

Inspiration
========

https://github.com/Primigenus/Cleaner-Hacker-News

Issues
=====

https://github.com/robmcguinness/hackernews-userstyle/issues
